name: Kesava Prasad
tagline: Student at TUM | Photography & Coding Enthusiast
about: I am a student at the Technical University of Munich (TUM), actively pursuing my academic curriculum while nurturing a diverse range of hobbies and interests. My passions span creative and technical domains: I capture the beauty of moments through photography, craft solutions with coding, and engage in dynamic activities like driving, racing, and rifle practice. I also thrive in competitive environments such as cricket, chess, and hackathons, where strategy and quick thinking are key.
